# fields

**Instance Property**

Returns an array of fields associated with the reset action.

## Declaration

```swift
var fields: [String]? { get set }
```

## Return Value

An array of `NSString` objects that corresponds to the `fieldNames` property of widget annotations (such as [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFAnnotationButtonWidget]) on the PDF page. This method can return `NULL`.

## Related Documentation

- **PDFActionResetForm**: `PDFActionResetForm`, a subclass of `PDFAction`, defines methods for getting and clearing fields in a PDF form.
